english.segment1: One year after the rings and a west coast honeymoon. We are living in a rented house with a terrible view. Youre finishing school and Im writing songs. Weve got no money but our love is strong
english.segment2: Im gonna love you always. Even on the not so sunny days. Through the good and the bad. Baby, I still do. Cause its always only you
english.segment3: One day maybe youll be a mom and Ill be a dad. But right now, baby just kiss me and lets not think about that. Cause were too busy planning cheap dates. Were rentin old movies and staying up late
english.segment4: Im gonna love you always. Even on the not so sunny days. Through the good and the bad. Baby, I still do. Cause its always only you
english.segment5: Do you remember the first time you held my hand. Im sure I would have liked that concert, but I wasnt watching the band
english.segment6: Im gonna love you always. Even on the not so sunny days. Through the good and the bad. Baby, I still do. I do love you, and I mean always. And I know they wont all be sunny days. But I meant what I said when I said I do. Cause its always only, just you and me. Always only you
